lead_paragraph: Brandon Stone and Daniel Brooks share the lead at the European Tour's South African Open after the third round was suspended because of approaching thunderstorms and the threat of lightning on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Stone & Brooks Share Lead at South African Open
headline.main: Stone & Brooks Share Lead at South African Open
